leftList.description: At least 510 people were reported to have died and more than 7,000 others were injured.[14][21] In Sarpol-e Zahab, the hospital was damaged and at least 142 people were killed, many who had lived in social housing complexes built by former president Mahmoud Ahmadinejad.[9][8][17] At least seven people were killed and another 500 injured in neighbouring Iraq, according to officials in Iraqi Kurdistan.[22][23] Further damages are possible due to the threat of landslides, favoured by the shallow depth of the earthquak
